org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.internal.declaration

Class AbstractDeclaration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.internal.AbstractService
      • org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.internal.declaration.AbstractDeclaration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Declaration, DeclarationHandle, Lifecycle, Status
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultExtensionDeclaration, DefaultInstanceDeclaration, DefaultTypeDeclaration

    public abstract class AbstractDeclaration
extends AbstractService
implements Declaration, DeclarationHandle, Status
    Common code to all Declaration objects.
